attributes.action: Please reduce the number of Members of Parliament for the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The number of MPs for the United Kingdom is far too high at 646 surely it is time the total number was reduced. The United States with it's population of 306,487,000 only has 100 senators and 435 members of the House of Representatives. The United Kingdom has a population of 61,612,300 and has 646 MPs and 92 peers under the House of Lords Act 1999

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
